001package com.technototes.path.util;
002
003import com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxModule;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap;
005import java.util.HashMap;
006import java.util.Map;
007import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system.Misc;
008
009/**
010 * Collection of utilites for interacting with Lynx modules.
011 */
012public class LynxModuleUtil {
013
014    private static final LynxFirmwareVersion MIN_VERSION = new LynxFirmwareVersion(1, 8, 2);
015
016    /**
017     * Parsed representation of a Lynx module firmware version.
018     */
019    public static class LynxFirmwareVersion implements Comparable<LynxFirmwareVersion> {
020
021        public final int major;
022        public final int minor;
023        public final int eng;
024
025        public LynxFirmwareVersion(int major, int minor, int eng) {
026            this.major = major;
027            this.minor = minor;
028            this.eng = eng;
029        }
030
031        @Override
032        public boolean equals(Object other) {
033            if (other instanceof LynxFirmwareVersion) {
034                LynxFirmwareVersion otherVersion = (LynxFirmwareVersion) other;
035                return (
036                    major == otherVersion.major &&
037                    minor == otherVersion.minor &&
038                    eng == otherVersion.eng
039                );
040            } else {
041                return false;
042            }
043        }
044
045        @Override
046        public int compareTo(LynxFirmwareVersion other) {
047            int majorComp = Integer.compare(major, other.major);
048            if (majorComp == 0) {
049                int minorComp = Integer.compare(minor, other.minor);
050                if (minorComp == 0) {
051                    return Integer.compare(eng, other.eng);
052                } else {
053                    return minorComp;
054                }
055            } else {
056                return majorComp;
057            }
058        }
059
060        @Override
061        public String toString() {
062            return Misc.formatInvariant("%d.%d.%d", major, minor, eng);
063        }
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Retrieve and parse Lynx module firmware version.
068     * @param module Lynx module
069     * @return parsed firmware version
070     */
071    public static LynxFirmwareVersion getFirmwareVersion(LynxModule module) {
072        String versionString = module.getNullableFirmwareVersionString();
073        if (versionString == null) {
074            return null;
075        }
076
077        String[] parts = versionString.split("[ :,]+");
078        try {
079            // note: for now, we ignore the hardware entry
080            return new LynxFirmwareVersion(
081                Integer.parseInt(parts[3]),
082                Integer.parseInt(parts[5]),
083                Integer.parseInt(parts[7])
084            );
085        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
086            return null;
087        }
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Exception indicating an outdated Lynx firmware version.
092     */
093    public static class LynxFirmwareVersionException extends RuntimeException {
094
095        public LynxFirmwareVersionException(String detailMessage) {
096            super(detailMessage);
097        }
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Ensure all of the Lynx modules attached to the robot satisfy the minimum requirement.
102     * @param hardwareMap hardware map containing Lynx modules
103     */
104    public static void ensureMinimumFirmwareVersion(HardwareMap hardwareMap) {
105        Map<String, LynxFirmwareVersion> outdatedModules = new HashMap<>();
106        for (LynxModule module : hardwareMap.getAll(LynxModule.class)) {
107            LynxFirmwareVersion version = getFirmwareVersion(module);
108            if (version == null || version.compareTo(MIN_VERSION) < 0) {
109                for (String name : hardwareMap.getNamesOf(module)) {
110                    outdatedModules.put(name, version);
111                }
112            }
113        }
114        if (outdatedModules.size() > 0) {
115            StringBuilder msgBuilder = new StringBuilder();
116            msgBuilder.append("One or more of the attached Lynx modules has outdated firmware\n");
117            msgBuilder.append(
118                Misc.formatInvariant(
119                    "Mandatory minimum firmware version for Road Runner: %s\n",
120                    MIN_VERSION.toString()
121                )
122            );
123            for (Map.Entry<String, LynxFirmwareVersion> entry : outdatedModules.entrySet()) {
124                msgBuilder.append(
125                    Misc.formatInvariant(
126                        "\t%s: %s\n",
127                        entry.getKey(),
128                        entry.getValue() == null ? "Unknown" : entry.getValue().toString()
129                    )
130                );
131            }
132            throw new LynxFirmwareVersionException(msgBuilder.toString());
133        }
134    }
135}
